content:
440 
 
  
ZING-DEG        
  
   (vi) BENIN requires Mathematics and two (2) Social 
Science subjects.  
(vii) ABSU requires fives (5) 'O' level credit passes in English 
Language plus three (3) other subjects and 'O' level 
pass in Mathematics.  
(viii) EDZAR requires ‘O’ level pass in Mathematics.  
(ix) CALABAR requires five (5) 'O’ level credit passes in 
English Language and o ther relevant   subjects and it 
accepts ‘O’ level pass in Mathematics.  
(x) OAU requires five (5) 'O’ level credit passes including 
English Language. Candidates with 'O’ level 
background should have 'O' level credit passes in two 
(2) of Economics, Geography, G overnment, History, 
Music, Fine Arts, Religious Studies and Home 
Economics.  Those with TC II should have merit in 
English and two (2) of the following subjects: Social 
Studies, History, Government, Home Economics, Fine 
art and Music, Religious Studies and  Literature in 
English.  
(xi) IAUED– Same as in Geography Education.  
(xii) EBSU requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes in 
English  Language,  Mathematics, 
 Government, Biology and one (1) other Social 
Science subject.  
(xiii) GOUU requires 'O' level credit pass in Mathematics.  
(xiv) KSU requires five (5) 'O’ level credit passes to 
include English Language, 'O' level pass in 
Mathematics and three (3) other relevant subjects.  
(xv) TASUED requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes at 
one (1) sitting or six (6) 'O’ level credit passes at two  
(2) sittings to include English Language, 
Mathematics, and three (3) or four (4) Social 
Science subjects.  
(xvi) ABUJA requires five (5)'O' level credit passes or its 
equivalentto include Mathematics, English 
Language and three (3) other relevant Arts/Social 
Science subjects.  
(xvii) AAUA requires five (5) credit passes including English 
Language, Mathematics plus three (3) Arts/Social 
Science subjects.
